name: AlleyCat Error Fix
description:
ALLEYCAT

The baddest Cat in whole damn Town! A Life of Adventure, Crime and Living on the edge,....The story of the ALLEY CAT.

Build with errors fixed for AlleyCat https://richathomas.itch.io/alleycat

Genre : Endless Runner

Gameplay

> Avoid Guards

> Steal Food on the barrels by jumping

TechTools

Unreal

Houdini - Used to generate the procedural elements for the game , like terrain, foliage , building system.
